  • Constructor Details

    • RSAAuthentication

      public RSAAuthentication() throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Creates a new Authentication object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the public or private key file could not be read from the key path stored in .env
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the RSA algorithm is not supported by the system
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the public or private key file is not a valid RSA key

    • RSAAuthentication

      public RSAAuthentication(String publicKeyPath, String privateKeyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Creates a new Authentication object with publicKeyPath and privateKeyPath as paths to the private/public encryption key.
      Parameters:
      publicKeyPath - path to the public key
      privateKeyPath - path to the private key
      Throws:
      IOException - if the public or private key file could not be read from the key path stored in .env
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the RSA algorithm is not supported by the system
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the public or private key file is not a valid RSA key

    • RSAAuthentication

      public RSAAuthentication(RSAPublicKey publicKey, RSAPrivateKey privateKey)
      Creates a new Authentication object with publicKey and privateKey as the private/public encryption key.
      Parameters:
      publicKey - public key
      privateKey - private key

    • createToken

      public String createToken(Map<String,?> payload)
      Creates, signs and returns a new token with a given payload. Implementation of Authentication.verifyToken(String) using JSON Web Tokens and the RSA256 algorithm.
      Specified by:
      createToken in interface Authentication
      Parameters:
      payload - The payload to add to the token.
      Returns:
      String - RSA256 JSON Web Token

    • verifyToken

      public com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT verifyToken(String token) throws com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException
      Verify a given token.
      Specified by:
      verifyToken in interface Authentication
      Parameters:
      token - The token to verify
      Returns:
      DecodedJWT if token is valid, null if token is invalid
      Throws:
      com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException - if token is invalid

    • getPublicKey

      public RSAPublicKey getPublicKey(String keyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads the public key from the given path.
      Specified by:
      getPublicKey in interface Authentication
      Parameters:
      keyPath - the path to the key file
      Returns:
      PublicKey the key from the file in keyPath
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file could not be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification in the file in keyPath is invalid

    • createKeys

      public void createKeys(String publicKeyPath, String privateKeyPath) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, IOException
      Generates a key pair and saves it to the given path.
      Specified by:
      createKeys in interface Authentication
      Parameters:
      publicKeyPath - The path to save the key public key to.
      privateKeyPath - The path to save the key private key to.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm is not supported.
      IOException - If the key pair could not be saved.
